title: SOMEONE PLZ HELP ME
body: im addicted to buying skins plz help me i have only 69 skins left to buy ( this is not a joke 69 is the actual amount)

replies.body: i have spent 2178 hrs on league..... what have a been doing all my life :(

Same dude. Disposable income is a bitch.

I mean, if you like it then its not a waste.

You can justify yourself with these 2 websites.

https://wol.gg/  which tells you how long you've spent playing league.

http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/   tells you how much you've spent on league.

$1 per hour is worth imo when you consider how much you pay for and play other games.
use that money to either save up or donate it to charities :)

You will never use them all, or even 20% of it. Dont waste your money, you'll regret in the future. Like that expensive toy you want your mommy to buy for you when you are young.
